name: Taco Rider !!
description:
Are you ready to ride? 

We're headed through taco-land to save our fellow food buddies. They've been stranded in the Cheese Maze and left behind on the Red Pepper Race Track. It's our duty to save them!! 

Hop in your taco, Rider!! We've got a mission to complete. Make it through the Cheesy Maze and the Red Pepper Race Track without falling off track !!
